sentences.sContent: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.sCn: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.sContent: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.sCn: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.sContent: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.sCn: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

sentences.sContent: ...how fast you're traveling and whether everything on your airplane is functioning normally...

remMethod.val: air(空中) ＋ plane(飞机) → 飞机

trans.tranOther: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines
